SEARCH
Package us.teaminceptus.novaconomy.api.util

Class Mail

java.lang.Object
us.teaminceptus.novaconomy.api.util.Mail
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, ConfigurationSerializable
public final class Mail extends Object implements ConfigurationSerializable, Serializable
Represents a message to be sent to a mail receiver, such as a Business or Corporation.
See Also:
